text: Mustafa Akıncı (; born 28 December 1947) is a Turkish Cypriot politician. He served as the fourth President of Northern Cyprus. from April 2015 to October 2020. == Early life == Akıncı was born in Limassol on December 28, 1947. He studied architecture at Middle East Technical University, where he met his wife, Meral Akıncı. He went back to Cyprus in 1973, and they got married in 1974. Their first child, Doğa, was born in 1975. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish politicians Category:Presidents of Northern Cyprus
title: Mustafa Akıncı
